subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Travers winner Will Take Charge bounced back from his loss in the Breeders’ Cup to win the Grade I, $550,700 Clark Handicap at Churchill Downs.
snippet: The Travers winner Will Take Charge bounced back from his loss in the Breeders’ Cup to win the Grade I, $550,700 Clark Handicap at Churchill Downs.
